Uses of Class
org.piccolo2d.PRoot

  • Packages that use PRoot 
    Package Description
    org.piccolo2d
    Piccolo is a general-purpose Java-based engine that supports 2D visualizations.
    org.piccolo2d.activities
    This package supports Piccolo activities.

    • Uses of PRoot in org.piccolo2d

      Methods in org.piccolo2d that return PRoot 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PRoot PRoot.getRoot()
      Since getRoot is handled recursively, and root is the lowest point in the hierarchy, simply returns itself.
      PRoot POffscreenCanvas.getRoot()
      Return the root node of the scene graph for this offscreen canvas.
      PRoot PNode.getRoot()
      Return the root node (instance of PRoot).
      PRoot PCanvas.getRoot()
      Return root for this canvas.

    • Uses of PRoot in org.piccolo2d.activities

      Methods in org.piccolo2d.activities that return PRoot 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PRoot PActivityScheduler.getRoot()
      Returns the node from which all activities will be attached.
      Constructors in org.piccolo2d.activities with parameters of type PRoot 
      Constructor and Description
      PActivityScheduler(PRoot rootNode)
      Constructs an instance of PActivityScheduler.
